enumDescriptions.AdministrateStorage: Administrator for storage subsystems and storage systems found in the storage collection and storage system collection respectively.
enumDescriptions.AdministrateSystems: Adminsitrator for systems found in the systems collection.  Able to manage boot configuration, keys, and certificates for systems.
enumDescriptions.ConfigureComponents: Can configure components that this service manages.
enumDescriptions.ConfigureCompositionInfrastructure: Can view and configure composition service resources.
enumDescriptions.ConfigureSelf: Can change the password for the current user account and log out of their own sessions.
enumDescriptions.ConfigureUsers: Can configure users and their accounts.
enumDescriptions.Login: Can log in to the service and read Resources.
enumDescriptions.OperateStorageBackup: Operator for storage backup functionality for storage subsystems and storage systems found in the storage collection and storage system collection respectively.
enumDescriptions.OperateSystems: Operator for systems found in the systems colletion.  Able to perform resets and configure interfaces.

enumLongDescriptions.ConfigureCompositionInfrastructure: This value shall be used to indicate the user can view and configure composition service resources without matching the Client property in the ResourceBlock or CompositionReservation resources.
enumLongDescriptions.NoAuth: This value shall be used to indicate an operation does not require authentication.  This privilege shall not be used in Redfish Roles.

title: #Privileges
